text: The women's 4 × 100 metres event at the 2015 Asian Athletics Championships was held on June 4. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Lane !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | || 6 || align=left| || align=left| Tao Yujia, Yuan Qiqi, Lin Huijun, Wei Yongli || 43.10 || CR |- | || 3 || align=left| || align=left| Saori Kitakaze, Anna Doi, Chisato Fukushima, Kana Ichikawa || 44.14 || |- | || 5 || align=left| || align=left| Supawan Thipat, Khanrutai Pakdee, Phatsorn Jaksuninkorn, Tassaporn Wannakit || 44.73 || |- | 4 || 4 || align=left| || align=left| Sini Sahadevan, Mg Padmini, Srabani Nanda, Dutee Chand || 45.72 || |- | || 2 || align=left| || align=left| Svetlana Ivanchukova, Viktoriya Zyabkina, Anastassiya Tulapina, Olga Safronova || || |} ==References== Relay Category:Relays at the Asian Athletics Championships Category:2015 in women's athletics
title: 2015 Asian Athletics Championships – Women's 4 × 100 metres relay
